titles.title: Electing Chaplain of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/25/2011--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects Father Patrick J. Conroy as Chaplain of the House of Representatives.
